metadata.title: Thursday, 14th April, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    how many desks were available at Munyama Basic School in Solwezi West Parliamentary Constituency as of February, 2016;
(b)    what the shortfall of desks at the School was;
(c)    when additional desks will be procured; and
(d)    what has caused the delay in procuring the desks.

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of Development Planning
parts: (a)    when the Government will facilitate the repatriation of the former Lenshina followers who reside at Kalundu area in Lusaka West, to their villages in Chama District; and
(b)    why the repatriation exercise has taken long to start when the people are willing to return to their villages.
